title: Kechara Oasis
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Delivery, Take-out, Southeast Asian, Malay, Banquet
description: A luxurious space that can accommodate 600 persons and includes 5 VIP rooms with karaoke facility, lounge and a tatami area; able to cater to special events. Kechara Oasis provides food that's good for the body, mind and spirit and also generate stores of merits by contributing its proceeds to a social responsible community program. Has dim sum in addition to a la carte menu.
